amendment.description: Amendment sought to expand eligibility to vote in the any plebiscites authorized by this bill to U.S. citizens of Puerto Rican descent residing in any of the 50 States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-468 to expand eligibility to vote in the any plebiscites authorized by this bill to U.S. citizens of Puerto Rican descent residing in any of the 50 States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 11 - 387 (Roll no. 238).
